channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nike’s stock is headed for a ‘swoosh’-shaped recovery after years of pain, analyst says
item.description: Nike has endured a tough few years marked by weaker demand and its own struggles to adapt to shifting trends. While the athletic-gear and sneaker make...

item.title: I’ve been a stay-at-home mom for 10 years. Do I take a part-time job to spend more time with my kids or get a job for six figures?
item.description: “So much of my head has been filled with thoughts of needing to be the best, the brightest, the wealthiest.”

item.title: Boeing is making a positive turn, says analyst upgrading stock to buy
item.description: Troubled aircraft maker Boeing was given an upgrade by an analyst who said a turnaround effort will get the market to reassess the stock.

item.title: The hidden scaling cliff that’s about to break your agent rollouts
item.description: Enterprise teams hit a scaling wall when managing AI agents across departments. Writer's May Habib explains why traditional software development fails...

item.title: Consumers cut spending on cars and restaurants as tariffs kicked in. Trade wars weigh on economy.
item.description: Americans have become more careful about how much they spend because of tariffs and a slower U.S. economy.

item.title: RISE Robotics raises funding for award-winning Beltdraulic actuators
item.description: RISE Robotics has continued to raise funding for its Beltdraulic actuation system, which it said offers advantages over hydraulics. The post RISE Robo...

item.title: The Download: how to clean up AI data centers, and weight-loss drugs’ side effects
item.description: This is today’s edition of The Download, our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. This battery...

item.title: This battery recycling company is now cleaning up AI data centers
item.description: In a sandy industrial lot outside Reno, Nevada, rows of battery packs that once propelled electric vehicles are now powering a small AI data center. R...

item.title: My wife and I have $7,000 in pensions, $140,000 cash, plus $3,500 in Social Security. Can we afford to retire?
item.description: “My wife of 20 years is a Japanese national and lives in the U.S. as a permanent resident.”

item.title: We’re learning more about what weight-loss drugs do to the body
item.description: Weight-loss drugs are this decade’s blockbuster medicines. Drugs like Ozempic, Wegovy, and Mounjaro help people with diabetes get their blood sugar un...

item.title: Walmart cracks enterprise AI at scale: Thousands of use cases, one framework
item.description: Walmart VP Desirée Gosby reveals how the retailer scales AI across 255M customers. Enterprise blueprint from Transform 2025 on trust-first deployment.

item.title: The Download: Google DeepMind’s DNA AI, and heatwaves’ impact on the grid

item.title: Google DeepMind introduces on-device Gemini AI model for robots
item.description: In addition to Gemini Robotics On-Device, DeepMind introduced an SDK to help developers evaluate the system for their tasks. The post Google DeepMind ...

item.title: FANUC unveils ROBOGUIDE v10 robot simulation software
item.description: The ROBOGUIDE offline programming and simulation software has enhanced performance features and an improved user experience, says FANUC. The post FANU...

item.title: What enterprise leaders can learn from LinkedIn’s success with AI agents
item.description: LinkedIn scientists share how they have found success with their LinkedIn hiring assistant, an AI agent that sources and recruits workers.

item.title: Digital Teammate from Badger Technologies uses multipurpose robots
item.description: The Digital Teammate can work alongside store associates to improve inventory management, food safety, and hazard mitigation, says Badger. The post Di...

item.title: Lessons learned from agentic AI leaders reveal critical deployment strategies for enterprises
item.description: What does it take to actually engineer AI agents to get the best return on investment? A panel of experts provides some unique insights.

item.title: Get paid faster: How Intuit’s new AI agents help businesses get funds up to 5 days faster and save 12 hours a month with autonomous workflows
item.description: Looking beyond AI assistants, Intuit has integrated agentic AI deeply into multiple processes to help businesses get things done.

item.title: It’s officially summer, and the grid is stressed
item.description: It’s crunch time for the grid this week. As I’m writing this newsletter, it’s 100 °F (nearly 38 °C) here in New Jersey, and I’m huddled in the smalles...
